name: Md. Nishat Miah
title: Back-end Web Developer
descriptions: As a motivated and detail-oriented Backend Web Developer, I have foundational expertise in PHP, and MySQL, with hands-on experience in the Laravel framework. My background in competitive programming(C++) has honed my problem-solving skills and ability to tackle complex coding challenges efficiently.
My goal is to become a highly skilled PHP developer, where I can contribute to and grow within challenging projects that push the boundaries of web development.
